articles.content: An irate argument broke out between a Taylor Swift fan and an Airbnb host as the latter attempted to increase the room rent after finding out that the guest would attend the singer's Eras Tour in Oct… [+1971 chars]

articles.title: "Saw Wartime Leadership": Radhika Gupta, Former Microsoft Intern, Praises Satya Nadella - NDTV
articles.description: "And in the last 5 days, we saw wartime leadership from you Satya that no management class can teach and every CEO can learn from," Radhika Gupta, Managing Director and CEO of Edelweiss Mutual Fund said.
articles.content:
Ms Gupta was as a Program Manager Intern at Microsoft in 2003 and 2004.
As the OpenAI saga concluded with Sam Altman rejoining the company as the CEO, several people hailed Microsoft CEO Satya Nadel… [+2340 chars]

articles.author: Benzinga India Staff
articles.title: India Loves iPhones But Gives Macs and iPads Cold Shoulder: Report - Benzinga India
articles.description: Shipments of AirPods and Apple Watches are likely to more than halve this year. In contrast, iPhone shipments are set to increase by 50% by the end of the year.
articles.content: Apple is likely to witness a decline in shipments for Macs, iPads, AirPods and smartwatches in India this year, even as iPhone demand continues to surge, according to industry analysts and retailers.… [+2086 chars]
